import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import Blogcard from './Blogcard' import { useState } from 'react' import Header from './Header' import { Client, Databases, ID, Query, Account } from 'appwrite'; function Blog(props) { const [blogs, updateBlogs] = useState([]) console.log(props.blogs); const [data, updateData] = useState({ fname: "", lname: "", email: "", phone: "", datetime: "", how: "" }) const handleChange = (e) => { updateData({ ...data, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(data); } useEffect(() => { updateBlogs(props.blogs) }, [props.blogs]) return ( <>
